StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SelectSec.onItem]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Sec.onItemId uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT si.[Sec.onItemId], si.[Sec.onId], si.[FriendlyName], si.[Sec.onItemType], d.[Sec.onItemId], d.[DocumentType], d.[FileExtension], f.[FormCfgId], f.[Signed], f.[Valid], f.[Sec.onItemId], f.[Assembly], f.[ClassName], f.[TemplatePdfFileName], f.[TemplateXdpFileName], f.[VersionNumber], f.[IsOQR] FROM [ACP].[Sec.onItem] si LEFT JOIN [ACP].[Document] d ON si.[Sec.onItemId] = d.[Sec.onItemId] LEFT JOIN [ACP].[Form] f ON si.[Sec.onItemId] = d.[Sec.onItemId] WHERE si.Sec.onItemId = @Sec.onItemId
